Package Delivery

Class Truck

  • java.lang.Object
    • Delivery.Truck
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    OrdinaryTruck, RefrigeratedTruck

    public abstract class Truck
extends java.lang.Object
    Truck abstract class. Can hold items and calculate a cost.
    Author:
    Chris

               throws DeliveryException
        Load multiple of the same item into the truck.
        Parameters:
        item - To load into the truck
        quantity - Quantity of specified item to be added to the truck.
        Throws:
        DeliveryException - if truck will exceed capacity.
